page.title: 16Trade Garages Buses Droxford
page.content: 2 Garages sell between them about 3800 galls. weekly.Open 8am_6pm Mon_Sat. {Taylors}fix about 100 cars per week no cars for sale.It has been here for 200 yrs,used to be the blacksmith.MrTaylor has worked here for 39 yrs.Uses Volvo as taxi to transport children to and from school.6 people employed. {Merringtons}has 24hr recovery service fix about 150 cars per week,sells Austin Rovers_75 in 1985.Business began with cycles in village present site in 1912.Apprentices learn there. No Sunday{buses}run . No.52:_3 buses daily between Peters_ feild and Southampton,4 on Saturday. No.38:_4 buses daily between Village and Portsmouth,3 on Saturday. Connections at Wickham No.69 to Fareham or Winchester. All services finish early.On Thursday a{community {Mini bus}runs West Meon_Fareham.
